data.text:
UEFA EURO 2024™ and CONMEBOL Copa América 2024™- FOX Sports Programming Highlights: Wednesday, July 10

Wednesday, July 10, 2024

Today’sResults:

EURO (Semifinal)

England def. Netherlands, 2 – 1 (HIGHLIGHTS)

COPA AMÉRICA (Semifinal)

Colombia def. Uruguay, 1 – 0 (HIGHLIGHTS)

Must-Watch Moments:

EURO

England is headed to the Euro 2024 Final

Ollie Watkins scores in the 90th minute for England

England’s Harry Kane hits the penalty to tie the game 1-1

A strike from Xavi Simons gives Netherlands the 1-0 lead over England

FOX Sports’ Tom Rinaldi shows the triumph and the agony that can come with penalties

Netherlands fans singing “Hey Jude” to England fans is next level

COPA AMÉRICA

Colombia players are full of emotions after they clinch its spot in the Copa América Final

Darwin Núñez and Luis Díaz share a moment after the match

Things got physical between Colombia and Uruguay after the final whistle

Colombia scores the opening goal of the night

Top Stories:

By Doug McIntyre: Gregg Berhalter out as USMNT head coach following Copa América group stage exit

By Doug McIntyre: USMNT coach candidates: 10 to watch, including Jürgen Klopp

By Laken Litman: USMNT ‘prepared to invest’ in ‘serial winning coach,’ targeting hire by September

By Martin Rogers: England advances to Euro 2024 finals on thrilling injury-time goal

By Martin Rogers: How a bench conversation sparked England’s historic semifinal goal

Today’s Top Quotes:

EURO

“The first thing I said about England was they are the Dallas Cowboys in that as many people hate them, love them, but everybody wants to watch. The reality is England, basically they’re going to the Super Bowl and everybody’s going to tune in on Sunday.”

FOX Sports analyst Alexi Lalas

“Don’t write him off. He could be a big part of the story.”

FOX Sports analyst Landon Donovan on England’s Harry Kane

“Unbelievable. I’ve been waiting for that moment for weeks. It’s taken a lot of hard work to get to where I am today. Grateful I had the opportunity, I grabbed it with both hands….I swear on my life, my kid’s life, I said to Cole Palmer ‘we’re coming on today and you’re gonna set me up.’”

England’s Ollie Watkins speaks on winning today’s match to clinch a spot in the final | WATCH

“It’s been a real difficult tournament, and to do what we’ve done away from home, is really special.”

England’s Harry Kane reacts after the team booked its trip to the Euro 2024 Final | WATCH

“Nothing comes close to this, I have never seen anything like this in my entire life.”

FOX Sports Reporter Michael “Timbsy” Timbs shows us the madness inside the Netherlands Fan March in Dortmund | WATCH

COPA AMÉRICA

“Credit to Colombia for the way that they played. They could have scored four goals today, ok, and with 10 men they had opportunity after opportunity running up and down, I mean the list of great performances goes up and down.”

Alexi Lalas shares his thoughts on Colombia’s victory over Uruguay

“Gregg Berhalter himself said on day one, he wanted to change the way people viewed American soccer globally – that ultimately didn’t happen.”

FOX Sports analyst Stu Holden shares his thoughts on former USMNT manager Gregg Berhalter | WATCH

“We need somebody that is going to inspire us. We need somebody that is going to make us excited. We need somebody, let’s be honest, that is going to bring us together and unite us in a positive type of feeling for where this team is heading relative to the 2026 World Cup and after this failure of Copa América that is not a place where we are….This had gotten to a point where [U.S. Soccer] needed to do something… Right now, this was the best thing to do for this team going forward and for 2026.”

Alexi Lalas reacts to the Gregg Berhalter news | WATCH

“There was some good things that he [Gregg Berhalter] did, but if you’re in a major competition and you’re on home soil and you don’t get out of the group, it’s a failure.”

FOX Sports analyst Clint Dempsey shares his thoughts on former USMNT Manager Gregg Berhalter | WATCH

“I do believe that players should take accountability as well, I think that there may have been from my point of view and vantage point, there may have been too much comfortableness going on within this squad. I don’t think some of the stars like Gio Renya and Weston McKennie raised their level enough and have been playing good enough. Christian Pulisic has raised his level, but I think at the end of the day, a coach does have that responsibility to get the best out of the players, but players also need to show up, be accountable and push themselves as well. So I think the next coach that comes in needs to get the best out of these players, needs to push these players more.”

FOX Sports analyst Carli Lloyd on Greg Berhalter’s release and the future of the USMNT | WATCH

Top Shots

Up NextonFOXand FS1(All Times ET)

Saturday, July 13 (3rd Place COPA AMÉRICA)

7:00 PM on FS1 – COPA TONIGHT

Alexi Lalas, Carli Lloyd, Rob Stone, Clint Dempsey

8:00 PM on FS1 – COPA AMÉRICA: Canada vs. Uruguay

JP Dellacamera, Cobi Jones, Dr. Joe. Machnik

FOX SOCCER NOW

Melissa Ortiz, Jimmy Conrad, Maurice Edu

Sunday, July 14 (Finals)

1:00 PM on FOX *two-hour pregame show – EURO TODAY

Alexi Lalas, Jules Breach, Peter Schmeichel, Daniel Sturridge

3:00 PM on FOX – EURO: Spain vs. England

Ian Darke, Landon Donovan, Geoff Shreeves, Tom Rinaldi, Mark Clattenburg

FOX SOCCER NOW

Melissa Ortiz, Jimmy Conrad, Wes Morgan, Ari Hingst

7:00 PM on FS1 – COPA TONIGHT

Alexi Lalas, Carli Lloyd, Rob Stone, Clint Dempsey

8:00PMonFS1 – COPA AMÉRICA: Argentina vs. Colombia

John Strong, Stu Holden, Jenny Taft, Dr. Joe Machnik

FOX SOCCER NOW

Melissa Ortiz, Jimmy Conrad, Maurice Edu

Full replays of each match are available on the FOX Sports app. For tournament announcements, coverage, notes, photography and more, visit FOX Sports Press Pass.
